name: Iron Remedies
description: Iron Remedies, a modest stone and mortar shop with a slate roof, specializes in metalworking, as indicated by its sign featuring crossed hammers, an anvil, and a repaired pot. The shop’s interior, warmed by a constantly glowing furnace, is filled with the sound of hammers on metal and displays various metal goods for purchase. The owner, <u>Norton-Ken Shapeseer</u>, a man in his late 30s with a cherry-red complexion and hands marked by forge work, spends most of his time in the workshop, only leaving to evaluate items for repair. Apprentice <u>Aeliana Daggerforth</u>, a fiery-haired tomboy in her mid-20s, surprises customers with her strength and skill in handling heavy iron pots and creating rough designs.

quest.name: The Lost Cauldron
quest.description: While getting a tool repaired at Iron Remedies, the adventurers overhear Norton-Ken sharing a story with Aeliana about an almost mythical iron pot that can turn heated water and a few simple herbs into ten powerful healing potions once a day. He further added that he saw the pot perform more than a decade ago and is just remembering it now because the owner contacted him yesterday to inform him that it was stolen. The owner is offering a reward for its return. Norton-Ken is convinced the pot will never be seen again as it is too rare and valuable for thieves to brag that they stole it. If the adventurers inquire, Norton-Ken will happily share the owner’s name and location so they can inquire further.
